XMLWriter::outputMemory

xmlwriter_output_memory

(PHP 5 >= 5.1.2, PHP 7, PECL xmlwriter >= 0.1.0)

XMLWriter::outputMemory -- xmlwriter_output_memory — Returns current buffer

说明

面向对象风格

XMLWriter::outputMemory ([ bool $flush = TRUE ] ) : string

过程化风格

xmlwriter_output_memory ( resource $xmlwriter [, bool $flush = TRUE ] ) : string

Returns the current buffer.

参数

xmlwriter

仅用于过程调用。被修改的 XMLWriter resource。此资源来自于对 xmlwriter_open_uri() 或 xmlwriter_open_memory() 的调用。

flush

Whether to flush the output buffer or not. Default is TRUE.

返回值

Returns the current buffer as a string.

参见

  • XMLWriter::flush() - Flush current buffer
